title: Hands On A Hard Body
description:
Tig and Cheryl tackle "Hands On A Hard Body," a charmingly heartfelt doc about a small-town Texas competition to win a pickup truck! Cheryl spills MAJOR beans about whether this doc made her cry (a la Dancing With The Stars), the two swap some horrifyingly hilarious assistant stories, and Tig reads fan mail reactions regarding her NPR/crossword comments! *this episode contains spoilers*  (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
